gr.interamerican.bo2.arch
Interface PersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>>

Type Parameters:
PO - Class that is persisted by the PersistenceWorker.
All Superinterfaces:
PersistenceUtility<PO>, Worker
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericHibernatePersistenceWorker, JdbcPersistenceWorker, LegacyPwAdapter
public interface PersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>>
extends Worker, PersistenceUtility<PO>

Persistence utility of a class. The PersistenceWorker is a Worker and a PersistenceUtility that operates on a type of PersistentObject. PersistenceWorker is a PersistenceUtility with more strict implementation rules.

Method Summary
 DetachStrategy getDetachStrategy()
          Gets the DetachStrategy associated with this PersistenceWorker.
 
Methods inherited from interface gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.Worker
close, getProvider, init, open
 
Methods inherited from interface gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.PersistenceUtility
delete, ignoresSomething, read, store, update
 

Method Detail

getDetachStrategy

DetachStrategy getDetachStrategy()
Gets the DetachStrategy associated with this PersistenceWorker. The DetachStrategy is needed in order to re-attach a PersistentObject to its Provider. This is necessary for persistent objects that need the provider, like Hibernate disconnected objects.

Returns:
Returns the DetachStrategy associated with this PersistenceWorker.
